sense.gloss: the same status or way, as (e.g. as expected, as I said)
counter for sets of things, counter for methods, ways, types
normal, ordinary, regular, usual, common, average
local train, train that stops at every station
correspondence, communication, transmission, news, signal, telecommunications
to be common (to), to be shared (by)
usual, ordinary, normal, regular, general, common
traffic, transportation, communication, exchange (of ideas, etc.), intercourse
circulation (of air, water, etc.), ventilation, flow
counter for messages, letters, notes, documents, etc.
understanding (esp. of male-female relations), tact, insight

sdata.j: こちらは↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑友達↑↓ともだち↓のレイチェルです。↑私↑↓わたし↓たちは↑同↑↓おな↓じ↑高校↑↓こうこう↓に↑通↑↓かよ↓っていました。
sdata.e: This is my friend Rachel. We went to high school together.

sdata.j: ↑左側↑↓ひだりがわ↓に↑秘密↑↓ひみつ↓の↑通路↑↓つうろ↓がある。
sdata.e: There's a secret path on the left.

sdata.j: この↑時間↑↓じかん↓↑帯↑↓たい↓は↑交通↑↓こうつう↓↑量↑↓りょう↓が↑非常↑↓ひじょう↓に↑多↑↓おお↓い。
sdata.e: At this hour, there is incredible traffic.

sdata.j: ↑都会↑↓とかい↓では↑気付↑↓きづ↓かれず↑通↑↓とお↓り↑過↑↓す↓ぎることもあるだろうが、↑村↑↓むら↓の↑中↑↓なか↓ではそうはいかない。
sdata.e: In a town you may pass unnoticed, whereas in a village it's impossible.

sdata.j: ↑狼↑↓おおかみ↓は↑普通↑↓ふつう↓、↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓を↑襲↑↓おそ↓ったりしません。
↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑日曜日↑↓にちようび↓には↑普通↑↓ふつう↓↑何↑↓なに↓をしますか。
sdata.e: What do you usually do on Sundays?

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑言↑↓い↓った↑通↑↓とお↓りにしなさい。
sdata.e: You are to do as I tell you.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓がすすめる↑通↑↓とお↓りにするほうがよい。
sdata.e: You had better do as I suggest.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑言↑↓い↓われた↑通↑↓とお↓りにしなければならない。
sdata.e: You must do as you are told to do.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑犬↑↓いぬ↓が↑庭↑↓にわ↓を↑通↑↓とお↓り↑抜↑↓ぬ↓けて↑行↑↓い↓くのを↑見↑↓み↓なかったかい。
sdata.e: Didn't you see a dog pass through the yard?
